issue.title: [C++][Compute] Add binary and LargeStringType tests to comparison kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14333](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14333). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The comparison kernels do not have tests for [Large]BinaryType and LargeStringType:
- equal
- not_equal
- greater
- greater_equal
- less
- less_equal

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14333?focusedCommentId=17492188) by Eduardo Ponce (edponce):*
Fixed by ARROW-13878 which adds [comparison tests for string/binary types](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/compute/kernels/scalar_compare_test.cc#L859-L900).
